tool.name: Reheader

param.name: input_header
param.label: Select source dataset
param.help: Header from this dataset will be used to replace header in the target dataset. May be either SAM or BAM dataset.

param.name: input_file
param.label: Select target dataset
param.help: Header from the source dataset will be inserted here. Should be a BAM dataset.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Copies header from *source* dataset into *target* dataset using ``samtools reheader`` command.
